room_title: Escape room "Houdini's Book of Secrets" by Premier Escape Adventures in Sarasota
room_description: Harry Houdini was noted as the world’s greatest magician and for his sensational escape acts of all time. Sometime before his escape, he told his beloved wife, Bess, that his journal with all the secrets to his stunts has been hidden in his study and that only the next greatest will be able to discover it. In order to be the next great, you will have to solve a series of puzzles using clues, hints, and strategy to find the hidden “Book of Secrets”. However, if you fail, you’ll become the next greatest disappearing act ever performed. You and your team have 60 minutes to find Houdini’s Book of Secrets.
